PegboardConfig.Name: pegboard
PegboardConfig.TutorialTip: Grab the little blue objects in the box, and put them in the pegboard holes one by one. At the end, put them back in the box.

FingerFollowConfig.Name: fingerFollow
FingerFollowConfig.TutorialTip: Follow the avatar finger with one of your index fingers.

EverydayTaskConfig.Name: EverydayTask
EverydayTaskConfig.TutorialTip: Wait for the liquid to be poured in the glass. When it is ready, grab the glass and pour it in the other container. You have to be above the red line to pour it.

RhythmConfig.Name: Rhythm
RhythmConfig.TutorialTip: When the note hits the destination, press the index button on the right controller.

FingerNoseConfig.Name: fingerNose
FingerNoseConfig.TutorialTip: Touch the avatar finger with one of your index finger. When you touch it, bring your index to the red sphere, that represents the nose.

EyeTrackingFollowConfig.Name: eyeTrackingFollow
EyeTrackingFollowConfig.TutorialTip: Follow the red cube with your eyes.

EyeTrackingMultipleConfig.Name: eyeTrackingMultiple
EyeTrackingMultipleConfig.TutorialTip: Look at the red cube and wait for the timer to finish. When the timer is finished, look at the other red cube.

EyeTrackingFixationConfig.Name: eyeTrackingFixation
EyeTrackingFixationConfig.TutorialTip: Stay fixated on the red cube until the timer finishes.
